span.div: The following resources provide guidance related to the COVID-19 as well as mitigation strategies for home, school, and the workplace.

a.strong: Board Presentation 3-25-20 with Updates to MEAL DISTRIBUTION PLAN

br.a: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention
Social Distancing: This is Not a Snow Day
Resources for Families During the Coronavirus Pandemic from Common Sense

br.br:
Illinois has also established a COVID-19 hotline and email address. If you have specific questions about COVID-19, you can contact the Illinois COVID-19 hotline at 800-889-3931 or via email at [email protected]
The District is monitoring the information provided by the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention, Illinois Department of Public Health, Cook County Department of Public Health, the Illinois State Board of Education and local municipalities.
